attributes.action: Save £900,000 by not painting plane red, white blue
attributes.additional_details: The selfishness of the conservative party is disgusting. We want our NHS workers to be paid, and to have qualifications to go into jobs after the virus, for our children to be able to eat at school, NO ONE cares about the colours of an airplane.
attributes.background: Scrap the rebranding of Boris' plane and put the money into paying NHS workers, and giving children free school meals.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
